document.title: Technical Bulletins: Hotel-Motel Tax in Tennessee Cities (2012)
document.abstract: This report discusses how cities levy the hotel-motel tax, limitations on levy of the tax, exceptions, collecting the tax and estimating proceeds from the tax, and includes a list of Tennessee city and county hotel-motel tax rates.
